entry.title: Sismo: Vibration Meter & Alert
entry.content:
优惠信息（价格：¥15.00 → 免费 [免费 ~ ¥15.00]）

全部价格信息

价格：免费

应用描述

Sismo vibration meter is analyzes the data from the iPhone or iPad accelerometer and builds a vibration spectrum. This allows users to see if an earthquake is happening in their area. Measure all vibrations and earthquakes ! How it works Seismometers are devices used to measure earthquakes. They are also known as seismographs or body tremors. Seismometers are used in seismology to measure the strength and direction of earthquakes. Sismo uses the iPhone or iPad's accelerometer to detect vibrations in the ground. These vibrations are then analyzed to create a vibration spectrum. This spectrum is then compared to known earthquake waveforms. The Sismo iPhone App is the perfect tool for anyone interested in seismology or earthquakes. Sismo is analyzes the data from the iPhone or iPad accelerometer and builds a vibration spectrum. This allows users to see if an sismic activity is happening in their area. Check the vibrations with your phone! Sismo is a seismometer that measures the vibration of the Earth. It is used to study earthquakes and tsunamis.One of the most important tools for seismologists is the seismometer, which is used to measure the vibration of the earth caused by earthquakes. The seismometer can also be used to measure the body tremor of people suffering from Parkinson's disease. Measure vibrations with iPad or iPhone. Always see these vibes with great viewing options. Customize the application with your own colors with 4 views. Special Views ; ● OSCILLOSCOPE The oscilloscope view is arranged for a full hollywood effect and is enjoyable to watch on your iPad or iPhone at your desk. ● METRONOME Metronome view detects harsh vibrations and has a plain appearance. ● GEYSER Geyser view also includes an alarm function and will easily show you the smallest movements like a geyser. You can set the threshold of vibrations listening and the threshold at which the Alarm will sound. ● WAVE The wave appearance can be set as a straight wave or a moving wave, allowing you to measure with high precision. Many views give you the chance to make a full screen. This allows you to focus on data only. You can also use it as a hollywood effect. People around you will be amazed when they see the cinematic view on your device. In addition, you can customize the entire appearance through the settings tab, if you are using your device with a stand, you can easily control the tilt of your stand with the bubble level function, which you can access under the settings tab and you can make accurate measurements with a perfectly flat floor.

Simply put, AeroPads won't step on the toes of your arrangement or get on the nerves of your sound guy (like most other pads out there). Highlighted Features: - A beautiful space-inspired interface with a simple and intuitive design. - Live View: Every key and three of your favorite patches are instantly accessible (best suited for experimentation, free-flowing sets, and songwriting). - Setlist View: Plan and build a detailed setlist (best suited for structured sets and seamless transitions). - The iconic Atmosphere Soundpack which includes five unique patches named after and inspired by the layers of Earth's atmosphere. - Three patches can be added to Live View to be made instantly accessible, so there's no need to dig through menus to just to change a patch when performing live. - Additional patches and Soundpacks available for purchase. - Key-specific pads in multiple tonalities: major, minor, and neutral. - Concert pitch adjustment. How to Use: 01. Cue a pad that matches the key of your musical arrangement. 02. Play overtop of the accompanying pads and soundcapes. 03. Enjoy the boost of audience engagement, musician confidence, and creative inspiration. Pads and soundscapes are intended as a subtle accompaniment to musical arrangements/performances. They are designed to be cued according to the key of the arrangement. Once cued, you'll hear a droning pad centered around the root note with additional harmonic textures within the selected key. The only time a pad's key should change within a song is in the instance of a key change. For best results, mix AeroPads appropriately within the overall mix. When mixed too loud, AeroPads may compete with melodies and the arrangement. When mixed too quietly, AeroPads may be less effective. When mixed appropriately, they will sound awesome.

应用描述

AudioTools提供了一套专业级音频和声学分析工具，应用价格已包含一系列实用专业工具 -- 包括SPL、RTA、FFT、扬声器极性测试、发生器、音频范围、CLF查看器及录音机，程序设计框架还能根据个人需要增添更多强大模块。 可根据个人需求选购其他模块来定制AudioTools，包括Smaart工具I、SPL曲线图或脉冲响应，可随时从你的iOS设备购买。 我们测试过所有iOS设备，校准了麦克风级别和频率响应以获得最佳结果。我们可以关闭Apple的低频滤波器，并在大多数设备上可测量高达120 dB的声压级。 你还可添加iTestMic、iPrecisionMic或iAudioInterface2获得完整的专业音频和声学测试与测量平台。 真实用户评价: “...AudioTools是一款“让人相见恨晚”的优秀应用”。 “我想这款应用是我有史以来买过的最好用的。” “我用过价值几千美金的复杂测试设备，却不敌这款应用套装。” ***** 应用价格包含 ***** * SPL测量仪 经典模拟SPL测量仪，包括A加权和C加权，以及快慢ANSI衰减模式。所有滤波器符合甚至超越ANSI 1型标准。 * RTA 1/3及倍频段实时分析仪。含触控GUI范围控制、指针、最大/最小条、噪音曲线覆盖。 * FFT 详细声学分析，多达32876点。可查看完整详情或平滑过渡到1/24、1/6、1/3或倍频程。含指针、可扩展图形及峰值追踪。 * 极性 扬声器极性检查器。将测试信号路由到扬声器，在屏幕上读取扬声器极性。 * CLF查看器 显示扬声器数据，包括阻抗绘图、轴响应、灵敏度、极响应、6dB覆盖，以及一个3D彩球绘图。 * 延迟查找器 测量脉冲从扬声器返回时间。 * 发生器 生成正弦波、方波、白噪和粉噪。 * 线路电平测试 拥有线路电平测量功能和频率计数器。 * 音频范围 一款双通道音频示波器，包括自动触发、可变增益和扫描率，以及范围图像存储。 * 录音机 一款单声道/立体声音频录音机，具有WAV和压缩格式8k-48k采样率。通过WIFI传输文件。 * 通过WiFi传输结果文件到PC/Mac。 * 音频计算器 ***** AudioTools内可选购模块 ***** * Smaart®工具 - 单通道模块。 在移动平台上享受强大的Smaart®功能。包括RTA绘图到1/48倍频程及声谱仪。在iPad上可分屏使用。 * 传输功能 -- 需要双通道接口。 双通道基于FFT测量。可使用音乐或粉噪作为信号源分析声音系统性能。 * ETC 能量时间曲线。绘制脉冲衰减，计算RT60时间。有内部或外部触发器。 * 脉冲曲线 录制并分析脉冲或正弦扫描，计算倍频程和1/3倍频程ETC、T30、C50、C80、CT、定义，还显示FFT和Schroeder曲线。 * LARSA 快速准确正弦测量扬声器及房间。 * SPL专业版 数字SPL测量仪，拥有ANSI慢、快、峰值、脉冲模式，以及LEQ。包括A加权和C加权，以及所有10个倍频段滤波器。 * SPL曲线图 按秒绘制SPL长达24小时，可选录音。此外，增加可选倍频段记录升级让此工具可匹敌任何专业记录SPL测量仪。 * SPL交通灯 监测实时声压级SPL和leq，并在一个简单的绿黄红显示屏上查看状态。 * STIPA语音清晰度 符合最新NFPA准则标准，用于evac系统测试及学校。 * 扬声器失真 测量任何驱动的THD+n。 * THD+n (需要iAudioInterface) * 阻抗测量仪和绘图(需要iAudioInterface) * 相位计 * 振幅扫描
